alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Thomas County through 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomasville, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Barwick, Everett, Newark, Eason, Metcalf and Oaklawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
